description: Ono Kyouka is a english teacher who accompanies Yasunaga on his visit to Ryouzanpaku. She helps Boris open up to others, while he helps her keep the class under control when most of her students ignore her. Both Ken`ichi and Boris believe that she might secretly be Master Class because of her ability to sneak up on Boris and to peacefully sleep during the Russian troops attack on the campsite.
name: Ono Kyouka
